src:
Ponsel Besutan Induk Tik Tok Dirilis, Speknya Gahar
04 Nov 2019, 21:44 by Adi Fida Rahman - detikInet


Foto: ByetDance

Jakarta - Setelah kabarnya berhembus cukup lama, indukTik Tok, ByteDance akhirnya resmi merilis ponsel pertamanya. Bernama Jianguo Pro 3, perangkat tersebut dibekali spesifikasi gahar.Dalam proses pembuatannya, mereka berkolaborasi dengan vendor ponsel asal China, Smartisan. Sejumlah aplikasi buatan ByteDance pun langsung terinstall di dalamnya, bahkan ada yang dapat diakses langsung dari lock screen.Bicara spesifikasi, Jianguo Pro 3 mengusung layar 6,39 inch dengan panel AMOLED dan resolusi Full HD+. Dapur pacunya pun tidak kalah dengan ponsel-ponsel gaming yang ada di pasaran.ByteDance memadukan Snapdragon 855+ dengan RAM 8 GB/12 GB. Tersedia pilihan memori internalnya 128 GB dan 256 GB.Empat kamera terpasang di bagian belakang. Ukurannya masing-masing 48 MP + 13 MP wide angle + 8 MP telephoto + 5 MP makro. Sementara kamera depannya tidak kalah ciamik, berukuran 20 MP.Baterainya berkapasitas 4.000 mAh dengan pengisian cepat 18W. Jianguo Pro 3 menjalankan SmartisanOS berbasis Android.Menariknya dengan spek gahar tadi, ByteDance menjual ponselnya cukup ramah kantong. Jianguo Pro 3 dilepas mulai dari 2.899 yuan atau sekitar Rp 5,8 juta. Simak Video "Kemenpar Gandeng TikTok untuk Promosikan Wisata Nusantara"[Gambas:Video 20detik](afr/fay)
text:
Mobile Phone Made by Tik Tok Mother Released, Gahar Specs
Nov 04 2019, 21:44 by Adi Fida Rahman - detikInet


Photo: ByetDance

Jakarta - After reportedly blowing for a long time, parent Tok Tok, ByteDance finally officially released his first cellphone. Named Jianguo Pro 3, the device is equipped with fierce specifications. In the manufacturing process, they collaborated with a Chinese mobile vendor, Smartisan. A number of applications made by ByDance were immediately installed in it, some even can be accessed directly from the lock screen. Speaking of specifications, Jianguo Pro 3 carries a 6.39 inch screen with AMOLED panel and Full HD + resolution. The pacemaker kitchen is not inferior to gaming phones on the market. ByteDance combines Snapdragon 855+ with 8GB / 12GB RAM. Available internal memory options are 128 GB and 256 GB. Four cameras are installed on the back. Each size is 48 MP + 13 MP wide angle + 8 MP telephoto + 5 MP macro. While the front camera is no less beautiful, measuring 20 MP. The battery has a capacity of 4,000 mAh with fast charging 18W. Jianguo Pro 3 runs Android-based SmartisanOS. Pulling it up with the fierce specs earlier, ByteDance sells its cell phone quite pocket-friendly. Jianguo Pro 3 was released starting from 2,899 yuan. Check out the video "Kemenpar Hand in Hand with TikTok to Promote Nusantara Tourism" [Gambas: Video 20second] (afr / fay)
